thread.title: 5 ways Oakland can preserve its soul in a tech boom
thread.title_full: 5 ways Oakland can preserve its soul in a tech boom - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Joe Garofoli
title: 5 ways Oakland can preserve its soul in a tech boom
text:
Photo: Michael Macor, The Chronicle NewCo co-founder John Battelle (left) greets Onno Koelman and Roni Krouzman, co-founders of the People Place, at the NewCo festival this month in Oakland. NewCo co-founder John Battelle (left) greets Onno Koelman and Roni...
Oakland Mayor Libby Schaaf has been using a new word lately to describe her vision for the technology hub growing in her city: “Tech-quity.” NewCo co-founder John Battelle (left) greets Onno Koelman and Roni Krouzman, co-founders of the People Place, at the NewCo festival this month in Oakland. NewCo co-founder John Battelle (left) greets Onno Koelman and Roni...
Oakland Mayor Libby Schaaf has been using a new word lately to describe her vision for the technology hub growing in her city: “Tech-quity.”
